name: COMMONWEALTH OF Pennsylvania v. Ronald WOODS, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH OF Pennsylvania v. Ronald WOODS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Judgment of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Fayette County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Terris J. Green, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Gerald R. Solomon, Dist. Atty., Samuel J. Davis, Ralph Warman, Uniontown, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
435 A.2d 179
COMMONWEALTH OF Pennsylvania v. Ronald WOODS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 15, 1981.
Decided Oct. 8, 1981.
Terris J. Green, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Gerald R. Solomon, Dist. Atty., Samuel J. Davis, Ralph Warman, Uniontown, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
